title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 420.1 - Project sponsors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 420.1 - Project sponsors

State Regulations
(a) Any
municipality, State agency, Indian nation or not-for-profit corporation, as
described in section
419.3
of this Title, which has the authority to apply for and receive State grants, is eligible to
apply to serve as a project sponsor. (b) A project sponsor must provide at least
20 percent of the project costs in the form of cash or documented in-kind
services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
420.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
